skills.name: Poisonous Teeth
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times and weakens the enemy's Defense and inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns with a 15% chance with each attack. The Attack Power increases according to Defense.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Destructive Blow
skills.description: The Attack Power increases as your HP decreases and your critical rate increases by 30%. The Attack Power increases according to Defense.
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>DEF</mark>*(-3.0*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's current HP % in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Current HP %</mark> + 8.5)

skills.name: Brutal Skin (Passive)
skills.description: Decreases the chances of being attacked with a critical hit by 50% and decreases the attacker's attack speed for 1 turn with a 50% chance when attacked. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.
